```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

# Attach packages

library(here)
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
# read in the data
ucsb_grad <- read_csv(here("data","ucsb_grad_data.csv"))
```

```{r, fig.cap = "Domestic enrollment (individual counts) at UC Santa Barbara between 2008 and 2019 by race/enthnicity."}
ggplot(ucsb_grad, aes(y = domestic_enrollment, x = year_abbr, fill = ethnicity)) +
  geom_col(position = "fill") +
  labs(x = "Year",
       y = "Domestic Enrollment", 
       title = "UCSB Domestic Enrollment Rates by Enthnicity") +
  theme_minimal()
```
